articles.author: SportsCafe Desk
articles.title: AUS vs PAK | Twitter and Perth boo World Cup hero Head's success for denying Lyon elusive 500th scalp - SportsCafe
articles.description: Few crowds can conjure the audacity to boo a national hero who a month ago wrote his name in the history books but Australia has never been known for shying away from emoting. The Optus Stadium echoed with boos after Travis Head wrapped up Pakistan's tail, le…
articles.content:
Crowd didn't like the wicket!
pic.twitter.com/CDLdisAlo5
Virat Sharma (@ViratSharm39743) December 16, 2023
LOL
Hahahahahaha the crowd booing Head getting that wicket turns out they don't just boo… [+1676 chars]
